sections.title: Practice present-moment awareness
sections.description: Mindfulness helps you stay grounded in the present moment, reducing anxiety about the future and rumination about the past. Regular practice improves emotional regulation, increases self-awareness, and enhances your ability to respond thoughtfully rather than react impulsively to life's challenges.
